body: Send all the cool stuff you guys have <3
body_tagged: Send all the cool stuff you guys have <3
title: Place to send cool Packs, Skins and Capes!!!

replies.body: I like this idea, the post could use a edit once stuff gets sent (if stuff gets sent) to keep it organised, but I think a post with a lot of different texture packs, skins capes, etc would be cool. It would make a good centralized area to find all of that stuff if you're looking.
replies.body_tagged: I like this idea, the post could use a edit once stuff gets sent (if stuff gets sent) to keep it organised, but I think a post with a lot of different texture packs, skins capes, etc would be cool. It would make a good centralized area to find all of that stuff if you're looking.

replies.body: thanks thought it would be cool to see the variety of what people use
replies.body_tagged: thanks thought it would be cool to see the variety of what people use
